attributes.additional_details:
In bible it stated, to me it means from year 2000 onward,

Oriental will be the Great Super Power of the World

China is the Super Train Engine of the world.

The Three starlight above the head of the three king from the Oriental approaching to see Jesus represents Three Chopstick of the Oriental, which is the China, Korea and Singapore.

The Five stars on our Great Mother National Flag representing

Mainland,
Taiwan,
Hong Kong,
Macau and
Singapore

All are golden shining stars of the Orient. also the great shield protect all Chinese against the western invasion
